Title: Belaseshe
Writer: Shibprasad Mukhopadhyay, Nandita Roy (screenplay), Nandita Roy
Actors: Soumitra Chatterjee, Swatilekha Sengupta, Rituparna Sengupta, Aparajita Adhya
Plot: A story of relationships that explores the intricacies of the married life, of life-long companionship, of promises and expectations and love.
